pullRequest.title: PLFM-6408
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add expires_in field to the token response.
Authentication time claim (timestamp when user logged in) should be in seconds, not milliseconds.
Authentication time in access token generated from refresh token should be the user log in time stamp, not the time stamp when the refresh token was created.
Error for wrong response_type should be invalid_response_type, not invalid_grant_type.

commit.message: PLFM-6408:  Authorization time is when user logged in, not when refresh token was issued
PLFM-6408:  Authorization time is when user logged in, not when refresh token was issued
PLFM-6408: Corrected oauth error codes returned for authorization requests
